text: aur yaad karo jab ibaraaheem kee usake rab se kuchh baaton mein pareeksha lee to usane usako poora kar dikhaaya. usane kaha, "main tujhe saare inasaanon ka peshava banaanevaala hoon." usane nivedan kiya, " aur meree santaan mein bhee." usane kaha, "zaalim mere is vaade ke antargat nahin aa sakate.
